title: Ukranian Easter Bread (Paska)
ingredients: ['2 (7g) sachets dried active baking yeast', '125ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '100g caster sugar', '750ml warm milk', '500g plain flour', '6 eggs, beaten', '100g caster sugar', '225g margarine, softened', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '1.5kg plain flour', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons melted butter']
